questiontext.text:
Consider a normal distribution with μ = 9 and σ = 4. Calculate the following probabilities:

The random variable X is located between 3 and 15, namely P(3 ≤ X ≤ 15):
{1:NUMERICAL:=1.733:0.01~%0%999999:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}

P(μ - σ ≤ X ≤ μ + σ)
{1:NUMERICAL:=0.680:0.01~%0%999999:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}

P(μ - 2σ ≤ X ≤ μ +2 σ)
{1:NUMERICAL:=0.955:0.01~%0%999999:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}

P(μ - 3σ ≤ X ≤ μ +3 σ)
{1:NUMERICAL:=0.997:0.01~%0%999999:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}

$$

generalfeedback.text:
The normal distribution is given by:
$$ \LARGE\frac{\mathrm{e}^{-\frac{{\left(\mathrm{\mu} - x\right)}^2}{2\, {\mathrm{\sigma}}^2}}}{\sqrt{2\, \pi\, \mathrm{\sigma}}} $$

The probability that the random variable X is located between a and b is:
$$ P(a \leq X \leq b) = \int_{a}^{b} f(x)dx $$

Use matlab to solve the integrals.
$$ P(3 \leq X \leq15) =1.733 $$

However in general,
$$ P(\mu - \sigma \leq X \leq \mu + \sigma) \approx 0.68 $$
$$ P(\mu - 2\sigma \leq X \leq \mu + 2\sigma) \approx 0.955 $$
$$ P(\mu - 3\sigma \leq X \leq \mu + 3\sigma) \approx 0.997 $$

$$

{1:NUMERICAL:=0.930:0.01~%0%999999:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}

P(μ - σ ≤ X ≤ μ + σ)
{1:NUMERICAL:=0.680:0.01~%0%999999:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}

P(μ - 2σ ≤ X ≤ μ +2 σ)
{1:NUMERICAL:=0.955:0.01~%0%999999:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}

P(μ - 3σ ≤ X ≤ μ +3 σ)
{1:NUMERICAL:=0.997:0.01~%0%999999:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}

$$

generalfeedback.text:
The normal distribution is given by:
$$ \LARGE\frac{\mathrm{e}^{-\frac{{\left(\mathrm{\mu} - x\right)}^2}{2\, {\mathrm{\sigma}}^2}}}{\sqrt{2\, \pi\, \mathrm{\sigma}}} $$

The probability that the random variable X is located between a and b is:
$$ P(a \leq X \leq b) = \int_{a}^{b} f(x)dx $$

Use matlab to solve the integrals.
$$ P(7 \leq X \leq12) =0.930 $$

However in general,
$$ P(\mu - \sigma \leq X \leq \mu + \sigma) \approx 0.68 $$
$$ P(\mu - 2\sigma \leq X \leq \mu + 2\sigma) \approx 0.955 $$
$$ P(\mu - 3\sigma \leq X \leq \mu + 3\sigma) \approx 0.997 $$

$$
